text: Access control riser diagram and door schedule approved and matches hardware and layout
Reader types (prox, keypad, biometric), controller specs, and power requirements reviewed
Locking hardware compatibility (fail-safe/fail-secure, strike vs. maglock) verified per code
Electric strike, maglock, or motorized latch installed and aligned with door frame
Request-to-exit (REX) sensor or button installed per location and height standards
Door position switch (DPS) wired and positioned correctly
Control panel installed in secure location with UPS or battery backup
Cabling to readers, locks, DPS, and REX routed in conduit or raceway with labeling
All field devices terminated properly in control panel; fuses or breakers included
Readers tested for authorized/unauthorized card access, door release
Lock relays tested for correct logic with DPS and REX inputs
Door held-open and forced-entry alarms tested and logged
Time zones, user access groups, and holidays configured
As-built riser diagram, door detail drawings, and panel layout submitted
Commissioning log, event logs, and operator training completed

id: • Manufacturer Specs: HID, LenelS2, Gallagher, Honeywell, Genetec, Axis, Bosch
